text: aur jab sunaee jaatee hain unake samaksh hamaaree khulee aayaten, to kahate hain: ye to ek purush hai, jo chaahata hai ki tumhen rok de un poojyon se, jinakee ibaadat karate rahe hain tumhaare poorvaj tatha unhonne kaha ki ye to bas ek jhoothee banaayee huee baat hai tatha kaha kaafiron ne is saty ko ki ye to bas ek pratyaksh (khula) jaadoo hai
